connector.description:
Consume Messages from Azure Servicebus.

The subscribtion name parameter needs to be populated in case of consuming from a Topic.

camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.to.name: camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.topicOrQueueName
camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.to.description: Topic Or Queue Name for the Azure Servicebus instance

camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.co.name: camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.connectionString
camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.co.description: Connection String for Azure Servicebus instance

camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.se.name: camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.serviceBusReceiveMode
camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.se.description: Sets the receive mode for the receiver

camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.su.name: camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.subscriptionName
camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.su.description: Sets the name of the subscription in the topic to listen to. This parameter is mandatory in case of topic.

camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.se.name: camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.serviceBusType
camel.kamelet.azure-servicebus-source.se.description: The service bus type of connection to execute. Queue is for typical queue option and topic for subscription based model.
